summary: A letter from Jacqueline Pearce to the US Criminal Division dated 1 April 2024, alleging a complex conspiracy involving a sex abuse ring connected to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, with co-conspirators in Australia. The writer claims to be a targeted victim and submits evidence regarding alleged manipulation, career destruction, and criminal targeting involving Australian individuals and institutions.

persons.name: Jacqueline Pearce
persons.context: Author of the letter, alleges she is a targeted victim of a sex abuse ring connected to Epstein and Maxwell, and reports on alleged co-conspirators in Australia.

persons.name: Fraser Ellis
persons.context: Identified as a person of interest and a prime source of targeting; mentioned making an unusual comment to the victim in 2022.

persons.name: Melissa Mahoney
persons.context: Alleged co-conspirator based in Queensland, accused of targeting the victim by providing corrupt files in a paralegal course to cause failure.

persons.name: Paul Gardner
persons.context: Mentioned in relation to 2014-2015 conspired sexual targeting, threats of 'Government Prostitution', and connections to Tasmania and the Mafia.

persons.name: Michael Carter
persons.context: Interacted with the victim; his involvement is connected to Tasmanian Government involvement and the victim's illegal detention in 2017.

persons.name: Christian
persons.context: A police officer who stated involvement in paid targeting of women for grooming and sexual interactions; claimed connections to the Mafia.

persons.name: David Bradley
persons.context: Connected to Tasmania, Adelaide University, and the Hells Angels Motorcycle gang; allegedly had illicit knowledge of the victim's manuscript.

persons.name: Vincent Bulone
persons.context: Connected to David Bradley, motorcycle gangs, and has family origins in Sicily; suspected of Mafia connections via his grandfather Vincenzo Bulone.

persons.name: Peter Bannister
persons.context: Connected to Port Pirie, the Red Devil Motorcycle Club, Paul Gardner (half-brother), and Michael Fetherstonhaugh.

persons.name: Michael Fetherstonhaugh
persons.context: Business advisor to the victim (2007-2010) for a Medical Business Plan, connected to Peter Bannister and the Regional Development Board.

persons.name: Shaun Steele
persons.context: Connected to the Red Devil Motorcycle Club in Port Pirie and Vincent Bulone.

persons.name: Peter Dutton
persons.context: Addressee of a separate letter (14 Nov 2023) from Jacqueline Pearce seeking expressions of interest for a victim support network.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as part of the alleged sex abuse ring the victim claims to be targeted by.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned alongside Epstein as part of the alleged sex abuse ring involved in the targeting.

connections.description: Pearce alleges Ellis is a prime source of her targeting and made unusual comments to her during a 2022 meeting.
Pearce accuses Mahoney of being a co-conspirator who sabotaged her paralegal course to destroy her career.
Described as half-brothers, both allegedly involved in the conspiracy and connected to motorcycle gangs.
Connected through alleged criminal targeting; Bulone introduced Bradley to the victim in 2019.
Both connected to the Red Devil Motorcycle Club in Port Pirie.
Connected through alleged motorcycle gang networks and the broader conspiracy.
Connected through business dealings and the Regional Development Board in Port Pirie.
Both made the same unusual comment ('How did that feel?') to the victim, suggesting a coordinated pattern.
Connected through alleged criminal networks; Bradley knew details of the victim's manuscript possibly via shared surveillance.

events.title: Threats and Police Targeting
events.description: Paul Gardner threatened the victim with 'Government Prostitution' and there was conspired police targeting.

events.title: Illegal Detention and Attempted Murder
events.description: Victim was illegally detained on her birthday (12 Jan 2017) and subjected to a conspired attempted murder by lethal injection.

events.title: Meeting with Fraser Ellis MP
events.description: Professional meeting in Fraser Ellis's office where he made an unusual comment to the victim.

events.title: Enrollment in Paralegal Course
events.description: Jacqueline Pearce enrolled in the BSB50720 Diploma of Paralegal Services at Melissa Mahoney Legal College.

events.title: Previous Contact to Criminal Division
events.description: Pearce's previous submission of evidence and reports regarding the targeting case.

events.title: Letter to US Criminal Division
events.description: Pearce sends this letter updating on new co-conspirator (Melissa Mahoney) and requesting investigation.

events.title: Letter to Peter Dutton MP
events.description: Pearce wrote to Peter Dutton seeking expressions of interest for a victim support network called ISPY.SUPPORT.

keyFacts: The complainant, Jacqueline Pearce, alleges she is a targeted victim of a sex abuse ring connected to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, with co-conspirators operating in Australia.
She identifies Fraser Ellis MP as a prime source of the targeting and claims evidence in constructed criminal case files about him is incorrect due to victim manipulation.
She accuses Melissa Mahoney of Melissa Mahoney Legal College in Queensland of being a co-conspirator who sabotaged her paralegal studies to destroy her career.

The document alleges a wide network involving Australian politicians, motorcycle gang members, legal professionals, and individuals with suspected Mafia connections, all purportedly involved in sexual targeting, grooming, and attempted murder.
The letter includes references to specific alleged events such as illegal detention in 2017, attempted murder by lethal injection, and the use of RF transmissions for surveillance and harassment.
